title: 'That's a beauty!' - Yadav removes Gunaratne on second ball
description: Watch India substitute Radha Yadav make a "wonderful" catch to remove Sri Lanka's Vishmi Gunaratne on the second ball of the second innings in their Women's T20 World Cup match in Dubai.
excerpt: Watch India substitute Radha Yadav make a "wonderful" catch to remove Sri Lanka's Vishmi Gunaratne on the second ball of the second innings in their Women's T20 World Cup match in Dubai.

html:
Watch India substitute Radha Yadav make a "wonderful" catch to remove Sri Lanka's Vishmi Gunaratne on the second ball of the second innings in their Women's T20 World Cup match in Dubai.
